Package groBot.servlet

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddGroBotServlet
    Reads the MAC address and name of the GroBot from the HTML form, then creates a GroBot and saves it to the DataStore.
    ChangePasswordServlet
    Checks that the old password matches before changing the user's password.
    ChangeScheduleServlet
    Saves edits made by the user to an exisiting schedule.
    ConnectToNewBotServlet
    Changes the GroBot the user is currently connected to.
    DataTransferServlet
    An HTTP request comes in from the microcontroller which calls this servlet to update the status of the GroBot.
    DeleteAccountServlet
    Deletes a user's accoutn and associated DataStore members.
    DeleteScheduleServlet
    Deletes a schedule from the DataStore.
    EditScheduleServlet
    Sets up the HTML session for editing the schedule selected by the user.
    GrowNowServlet
    Updates a user and his/her GroBot's current schedule with the schedule selected by the user.
    LoginServlet
    Logs a user into the website.
    LogoutServlet
    Loggs the user out of the website.
    NewScheduleServlet
    Creates a new custom schedule and assigns it to the user in the DataStore.
    RegistrationServlet
    Registers a GroBot user.
    ResetPasswordServlet
    Resets a user's password if he/she forgot his/her login password.
    SecureServlet
    Verifies that the user accessing GroBot pages is logged in.
